description_zh: #OpenAI 的最先進大型語言模型，具有強大的理解和生成能力.
description_en: OpenAI's most advanced large language model
tier_id: with powerful understanding and generation capabilities.

description_zh: Anthropic 開發的對話式 AI 助手，專注於安全和有幫助的回應.
description_en: Conversational AI assistant developed by Anthropic
tier_id: focusing on safe and helpful responses.

description_zh: 一個 AI 圖像生成工具，可以根據文字描述創建藝術圖像.
description_en: An AI image generation tool that creates artistic images from text descriptions.

description_zh: 開源的 AI 圖像生成模型，可以在本地運行.
description_en: Open-source AI image generation model that can run locally.

description_zh: Google 的多模態 AI 模型，可以處理文本、圖像和其他類型的數據.
description_en: Google's multimodal AI model that can process text

description_zh: 問答平台巨頭Quora開發的超級AI整合器
description_en: Super AI integrator developed by Quora

description_zh: OpenAI 的大型語言模型，ChatGPT 的前身版本.
Meta 的開源大型語言模型，可以在本地運行.
description_en: Meta's open-source large language model that can run locally.

description_zh: 法國初創公司開發的高效能開源大型語言模型.
description_en: High-performance open-source large language model developed by a French startup.

description_zh: 基於 AI 的搜索引擎，提供有來源的回答.
description_en: AI-based search engine that provides answers with sources.

description_zh: 由 OpenAI Codex 驟動的 AI 編程助手，幫助開發者編寫代碼.
description_en: AI programming assistant powered by OpenAI Codex

description_zh: Google 的對話式 AI 助手，後來更名為 Gemini.
Codeium 開發的 AI 編程助手，專注於代碼生成和問題解決.
description_en: AI programming assistant developed by Codeium
tier_id: focusing on code generation and problem-solving.

description_zh: 免費的 AI 編程助手，提供代碼補全和建議.
description_en: Free AI programming assistant providing code completion and suggestions.

description_zh: Google 的免費AI沙盒，有Google所有最新的模型可以使用，而且還備有「神器」，包括「媲美P圖的AI繪圖工具」還有「實時共享畫面」
description_en: A free sandbox with Google's latest models
tier_id: including blackmagic-level tools like "AI Photo Gen/Edit" and "Stream Realtime"
